subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Danny Lee moved to the brink of supplanting Tiger Woods as the youngest champion in United States Amateur history by defeating Patrick Reed 3 and 2 in the semifinals Saturday in Pinehurst, N.C.
snippet: Danny Lee moved to the brink of supplanting Tiger Woods as the youngest champion in United States Amateur history by defeating Patrick Reed 3 and 2 in the semifinals Saturday in Pinehurst, N.C.
